item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 30, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Geometric line-art of Wacław Szpakowski (2017) (229 points | 24 comments)
2. Engineering Sleep (198 points | 69 comments)
3. Nodezator is a generalist Python node editor (110 points | 30 comments)
4. Breaking the 4Chan CAPTCHA (402 points | 196 comments)
5. What does this button do? – My new car has a mysterious and undocumented switch (429 points | 303 comments)
6. Making Screenshots of Test Equipment Old and New (48 points | 7 comments)
7. Archaeometallurgical investigation of the Nebra Sky Disc (39 points | 5 comments)
8. Abacist – Calculations with non-decimal units and mixed bases in Scala (12 points | discuss)
9. Understanding SIMD: Infinite complexity of trivial problems (199 points | 79 comments)
10. Everything You Never Wanted to Know About Linker Script (2021) (67 points | 11 comments)
11. Lessons from 15 Years of Indie App Development (124 points | 41 comments)
12. Neomacs: Structural Lisp IDE/browser/computing environment (67 points | 19 comments)
13. The Revised SI of physical units (2019), Max Planck (1900), and 'Planck scale' (23 points | 3 comments)
14. DeepThought-8B: A small, capable reasoning model (76 points | 54 comments)
15. The Influence of Bell Labs (162 points | 91 comments)

18. The Hall SC-VGA-2 Video Processor, the Atari ST and NeXTSTEP (54 points | 8 comments)

20. Samurai: Adapting Segment Anything Model for Zero-Shot Visual Tracking (31 points | 2 comments)
21. Engineers do not get to make startup mistakes when they build ledgers (496 points | 481 comments)
22. Core copyright violation moves ahead in The Intercept's lawsuit against OpenAI (255 points | 264 comments)
23. Perhaps acquiring Pixelmator is about competing with Creative Cloud (93 points | 62 comments)
24. Mirror, Mirror on the Wall, What Is the Best Topology of Them All? (65 points | 6 comments)
25. The UX of Lego Interface Panels (2020) (507 points | 45 comments)
26. Long Fatigue: The exhaustion that lingers after an infection (85 points | 67 comments)
27. Summary of "Improvising cellular playgrounds in Realtalk", Aug 2023 [video] (30 points | 3 comments)
28. Borgo Programming Language (334 points | 159 comments)
29. ASML Twinscan EXE:5000 Lego Set (57 points | 22 comments)
30. The great abandonment: what happens to the natural world when people disappear? (121 points | 156 comments)
